column5: Check it out. I realize we don't target octopi but they are underwater critters like the fish we chase http://www.ted.com/index.php/talks/view/id/206 Doesn't that make you wanna think twice about the lures you use/  JF
That is really cool!  Especially enjoyed the bit about the male only showing his "nice" side to the female.......nature is amazing!
That was incredible John, thanks for sharing.
Thanks for posting that John really enjoyed it
I spent much of my youth hunting Octopi (in the Med) .. they are truly amazing creatures
